WHY_CHOOSE.TITLE: Why Choose Rashed?
WHY_CHOOSE.DESC: We provide you with triple comfort! Our home services are delivered by a carefully trained professional team with support in cleaning and hygiene practices. You get guaranteed quality, continuous support, and a hassle-free experience. Simply put, we are the choice that gives you peace of mind.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Over 25 Years of Maintenance Experience
EXPERIENCE.DESC: With over 25 years of experience, we are certified experts ready to meet all your manual maintenance service needs. Trust our skills and professionalism to achieve excellent results.

ABOUT.HERO_TITLE: Reliable and Fast Home Services at Your Fingertips
ABOUT.HERO_DESC: From cleaning to maintenance, save your time and effort and let our experts take care of every detail of your home
ABOUT.TEXTSIMPLE: We work to provide reliable maintenance services
ABOUT.TEXT5: We provide you with maintenance services and knowledge of everything your home needs to always stay in its best condition.
ABOUT.TEXT1: We aim to make home maintenance easier and faster than ever by offering reliable services delivered by professional technicians.
ABOUT.TEXT2: To become the first destination for reliable home maintenance services, providing precise and fast solutions that maintain your home's comfort and quality.
ABOUT.TEXT3: We strive to be the first choice for anyone seeking comprehensive maintenance services with the highest quality, fast execution, and affordable prices.
ABOUT.MISSION_TEXT:
We are a specialized platform offering high-quality and fully reliable home maintenance services. We aim to make your daily life easier through a professional team that takes care of every detail of your home, ensuring comfort and safety in every service we provide.
We offer a comprehensive range of services including electrical work, plumbing, air conditioning, painting, carpentry, and cleaning, with easy booking available anytime and anywhere. Our goal is to be your permanent partner in keeping your home in its best condition, through fast response, reasonable prices, and results that exceed your expectations.
ABOUT.GOALGO: We aim to provide reliable maintenance services that reflect your home's true needs, through a specialized team offering comprehensive solutions including repair, follow-up, and routine maintenance to ensure your comfort and quality of daily life.
FEATURES: Specialized services and professional technical solutions for all your home needs.
Audio tips and practical guidance to care for your home and keep its equipment in optimal condition.
Field reports with photos showing maintenance steps and the quality of service execution in your home.
Publishing semi-annual reports showing service performance and development of maintenance methods to continuously improve the customer experience.

CATEGORY_PAGE.TITLE: Categories
CATEGORY_PAGE.DESC: Rely on us as a trusted partner for exceptional maintenance solutions that transform your spaces into a beautiful haven. Our specialized team offers a wide range of services tailored to meet your unique needs.

SERVICES_PAGE.DESC: Rely on us as a trusted partner for exceptional maintenance solutions that transform your spaces into a beautiful haven. Our specialized team offers a wide range of services tailored to meet your unique needs.

CONTACT_PAGE.TITLE: Contact Our Team
CONTACT_PAGE.SUBTITLE: We are here to help! Reach out to us for any inquiry, feedback, or service request, and we will respond as quickly as possible to ensure your comfort and quality experience with us.

FORM.NAME: Name
FORM.NAME_ERROR: Name is required and must be at least 3 characters
FORM.PHONE_ERROR: Enter a valid phone number (10 to 15 digits)

FORM.SUBJECT_ERROR: Subject is required and must be more than 5 characters

CONTACT_PAGE.LEFT_TEXT: We value your opinion and are always happy to hear from you, whether you have questions, need assistance, or want to share feedback about our services. Don’t hesitate to contact us—our specialized team is always ready to provide support and ensure a smooth and convenient maintenance experience that meets your expectations.

AUTH.SLOGAN_DESC: Login now and enjoy reliable and fast home services, from cleaning and maintenance to all your home's needs.. in one place
